original_text: As soon as the command was spread abroad, the people of Israel gave in abundance the firstfruits of grain, wine, oil, honey, and of all the produce of the field. And they brought in abundantly the tithe of everything.
korean_text: 왕의 명령이 내리자 곧 이스라엘 자손이 곡식과 포도주와 기름과 꿀과 밭의 모든 소산의 첫 열매들을 풍성히 드렸고 또 모든 것의 십일조를 많이 가져왔으며

sentences.original_text: As soon as the command was spread abroad,
the people of Israel gave in abundance
the firstfruits of grain, wine, oil, and honey,
and of all the produce of the field.
And they brought in abundantly the tithe of everything.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 모든 것의 십일조를 풍성하게 가져왔습니다.
